### emitBytes() {#a84ae01f49390c5af037bb0246c8f1a22}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RISCVELFStreamer::emitBytes (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Data)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit the bytes in <code>Data</code> into the output.

This is used to implement assembler directives such as .byte, .ascii, etc.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h">RISCVELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp">RISCVELFStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitFill() {#ab66ae90afc003b5739dac0c82e32dda9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RISCVELFStreamer::emitFill (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &amp; NumBytes, uint64&#95;t FillValue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit <code>Size</code> bytes worth of the value specified by <code>FillValue</code>.

This is used to implement assembler directives such as .space or .skip.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="NumBytes">- The number of bytes to emit.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FillValue">- The value to use when filling bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc&quot;>Loc</a>">- The location of the expression for error reporting.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h">RISCVELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp/#l00177">177</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp">RISCVELFStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitValueImpl() {#af6b9ac04f8804b9305c807ba70815442}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RISCVELFStreamer::emitValueImpl (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; Value, unsigned Size, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit the expression <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> into the output as a native integer of the given <code>Size</code> bytes.

This is used to implement assembler directives such as .word, .quad, etc.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/value&quot;>Value</a>">- The value to emit.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">- The size of the integer (in bytes) to emit. This must match a native machine width.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc&quot;>Loc</a>">- The location of the expression for error reporting.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-h">RISCVELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp/#l00183">183</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvelfstreamer-cpp">RISCVELFStreamer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
